name: Long Distance Virtualationship 2.0
description:
"She's far away, she's still the one outside the window. Nothing can replace a face-to-face meeting."

This is my second artwork from the "Long Distance Virtualationship" series. A poster version of this work is currently on display at the international poster exhibition "Post Human", February 7-12, 2022, presented by Telkom Institute of Technology Purwokerto, Indonesia.
